text: "The staff is very encouraging and supportive, making this the best place for students to study," one graduate wrote.  Another said, "Studying at Trent Global College was an amazing experience.  Every employee, especially Patrick Sir, Prabha Mam, and Aldo Sir, is incredibly kind and accommodating.
I would say this is the best private college in Singapore. All the staff is very helpful and understanding in assisting and providing relevant information. Special regards to aldo sir and prabha mam

Im from sri lanka and i came Singapore to my high study for in Singapore for trent global college im verry happy for choosed for trent college because lectures every things are very successful i will highly recommend for trent global gollege
My name is Nikhil. It was a great and wonderful experience to study at Trent Global College The classrooms are excellent, and all the staff members are very nice and helpful.

Hello everyone, I'm an Indian TGC student. Am happy to be a part of Trent, where my new career begins here. The staff are very encouraging and supportive, making this the best place for students to study. Each module's lectures were interesting, and I gained good experience and learned a lot overall. Mr. Patrick, the head of the faculty, and the other members of the TGC management staff were particularly helpful & very friendly.
Finally am graduated with flying colours
